verse.lines: {lang-eng}I must tell Jesus I must tell Jesus I cannot bear my Burdens alone I must tell Jesus I must tell Jesus Jesus can help me Jesus alone{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}I must tell Jesus All of my trials I cannot bear these Burdens alone In my distress He kindly will help me He ever loves And cares for His own{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}I must tell Jesus All of my troubles He is a kind Compasionate friend If I but ask Him He will deliver Make of my troubles Quickly an end{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Tempted and tried I need a great Savior One who can help My burdens to bear I must tell Jesus I must tell Jesus He all my cares And sorrows will share{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}O how the world To evil allures me O how my heart Is tempted to sin I must tell Jesus And He will help me Over the world The victory to win{/lang-eng}
